name: Repit
description:
Repit is a minimalistic game in which you have to go through unpredictable levels with hidden traps

Minuses


  • Super Minimalistic Graphics
  • Inconvenient controls
  • Terrible game design
  • Annoying music
  • Lack of plot

Pros


  • Simple graphics - does not distract from the process
  • Learn to control a character - bonus free mechanic
  • Unique game design
  • A cacophony you haven't heard yet
  • No poorly written characters and cliched cliches
